shortdesc.ph: Used to configure Last-mile network testing.
Used to configure the last-mile network test.

plentry.pd:
Set whether to test the uplink network:
: Test the uplink network. For example, in the LIVE_BROADCASTING scenario, audience users do not need this test.
: Do not test the uplink network.

Set whether to test the downlink network:
: Test the downlink network.
: Do not test the downlink network.
The expected maximum uplink bitrate (bps) for the local user, range [100000, 5000000]. It is recommended to refer to when setting this value.
The expected maximum downlink bitrate (bps) for the local user, range [100000, 5000000].

Whether to test the uplink network.
: Test the uplink network.
: Do not test the uplink network. For example, in the LIVE_BROADCASTING channel profile, audience members typically do not need to test the uplink network.

Whether to test the downlink network.
: Test the downlink network.
: Do not test the downlink network.
The maximum expected uplink bitrate (bps) for the local user. The range is [100000, 5000000]. It is recommended to refer to when setting this value.
The maximum expected downlink bitrate (bps) for the local user. The range is [100000, 5000000].
